name: Subverted Expectations: A dating Sim!
description:
Subverted Expectations: A dating sim! or SEADS, is a game in which you can date either males or females. You play a person who unfortunately judges a book by their cover.  People are not who they seem to be though! Explore 3 male options and 3 Female options! Be a perv! Or dont! 

This game is NOT finished. Just a little demo.

Features:
The ability to be a jerk and a perv
normal dating sim abilities
nerds!
jocks!
preps!
and more!!
